examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I logged on today and all my content was gone.  I have been without my phone since last Friday.  Could this be the reason why?  If so, what can I do?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi.  I am in trial period.  wondering if you can get some softball content.  Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: hello I tried to create a 'new team' and I cannot find the content created as our previous team. Can you help please? Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, 
One of my team member can not access pro content on here, how can we fix this? 
Thank you have a great day!
What kind of problem is there ?: Other Explain your problem: HELLO CAN I CHANGE THE LETTER IN THE CONTENT?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello. I was using the content planner and I kept getting error messages when trying to schedule twitter posts that tagged other users. Then I was getting failure emails for twitter posts that reach the character count. Any ideas on how to address these two issues? Thanks!

What kind of problem?: Sharing

Describe your issue: I am trying to schedule FB posts in March, but March is grayed out. Maybe because I'm on a 30 day trial? I am willing to skip the trial as this is the key thing I need to do this month (is schedule content for all of March). Please advise. Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there I have saved a whole lot of content in folders named content bank.  I have logged into Canva on a new laptop and they are not there but still appearing on my phone in Canva

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: fix the bug content planner please , urgent , i cant see inside the folders

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: This is outrageous! I have been struggling with the content planner this whole week. I will set up my posts with specific times and if I go back the next day the dates and times are changed. My business functions on these posts and of Canva cant properly help me do what it should I will take my business elsewhere
What do you need help with ?: I CANNOT VINCYULOAR MY FACEBOOK TO PUBLISH ON THE CONTENT PLANNER

What kind of problem ?: Share Describe the problem: Dear Canva team, In our team we want to use the content planner. However, the other person cannot see the scheduled posts. Where can this be changed?
What do you need help with ?: duplicate account, one with no content.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: how my team not have access to Canva Pro content

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Kindly review my content(images). They are in review for almost 6 months.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, a while ago I emailed you about lost content under my profile and I provided all information.  I still have not heard back. Please assist.

What kind of problem?: Please describe other problems: I am using Canva Pro as a team. However, I am logged in, but the paid content is not being used (I used it yesterday. It is not working today) Even if I log out and log in again. We ask for a quick solution.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: More Black History related content please!!
What kind of problem is there ?: Other Describe your problem: MORE CONTENT PROBLEM
